description: Natural Resources Canada (NRCan) has a requirement for the supply of a Fourier Transform Infrared (FTIR) Gas Analyzers. The requirement must include all of the following specifications and components below.
full_summary:
====================================

### Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP)

**Reference Number:** PW-23-01020706
**Solicitation Number:** 5000070741
**Procurement Number:** PW-23-01020706

### Tender Details

* **NPP Title:** Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP)
* **NPP Type:** Request for Proposals (RFP)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Selective Tendering
* **Trade Agreements:** Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity:** Canada
* **Delivery Location:** National Capital Region (NCR) and Canada

### Goods and Services

The Canadian government is seeking proposals from interested suppliers for the supply of a Fourier Transform Infrared (FTIR) Gas Analyzer. The successful bidder will be required to provide the following specifications and components:

* [Insert specific specifications and components here]

### Tender Requirements

The tender must include all specifications and components listed above. Proposals must be submitted electronically to the address listed below by no later than February 17, 2023 at 2:00 PM EST.

### Contact Information

For more information, please contact:

Thihan Dissanayake
Email: [thihan.dissanayake@nrcan-rncan.gc.ca](mailto:thihan.dissanayake@nrcan-rncan.gc.ca)

### Documents

The complete tender document is available on the Canadian Government's procurement website at [this link](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/10/ca7efed793ed1e7ff61ca027b7aefc2d/notice_of_proposed_procurement_npp_-_nrcan_5000070741_.pdf).

Note: Dates and details excluding the need for an FTIR Gas Analyzer and contact information have been removed for brevity purposes. Only what is necessary has been kept.ulated to be consistent. ```markdown
